name: Document.location
description: The Document.location read-only property returns a Location object, which contains information about the URL of the document and provides methods for changing that URL and loading another URL.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'Document.location' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'Document.location' in the 'HTML5' specification.
